text:
IIUC modules that pull string values out of ap_expr can't make use of regexes in the expression to transform the value before it pops out.  

This is because the starting state is "string" and while backrefs are reachable, operators that actually do a regex are not.

Maybe a three-parm function (string, regex, replacement) kind of like preg_replace()? e.g. subst("^/[^/]+/(.*)", "$1", %{FOO})
